title: Competition Achievements
description: Competed in multiple international and national computer science competitions.
achievements: Part of the INSA Lyon ICPC team (2024, 2025)
3rd in France in ICPC (SWERC 2025), I'm going to compete at the 2026 ICPC European Championship
1st place in a France-IOI contest (Castor Informatique 2020) among more than 500,000 participants
1st place in Match'Up Coding Battle (formerly Le Shaker) 2020 among more than 2000 participants
Now responsible for designing contest exercises

title: VR Research Intern at Suwa University
description: Conducted a 2-month research internship at Suwa University on behavioral changes due to Virtual Reality.
achievements: Designed and executed VR experiments to study user behavior and psychological impacts of immersive technologies
Analyzed experimental data using statistical methods, identifying key behavioral patterns and correlations
Developed VR prototypes using Unity for research simulations and user testing
Presented research findings at university symposiums

title: Volunteer & Community Leader at INSAlgo & Tech Communities
description: Active member and organizer in tech communities, leading initiatives to foster learning, collaboration, and professional development in computer science and programming.
